record.text:
そもそもいまだ生成に興味のない人間、ChatGPTとかGrokとかGeminiとかを、たぶん検索エンジンかなんかだと思ってますよ。

いや、正しいんですけどね。著作物を無限に取り込むことで従来のものから格段に精度の落ちたゴミみたいな検索エンジン。

別に中国の政治形態の擁護なんぞこれっぽっちもするつもりはないですが。
「それに比べて日本って素晴らしいわよね」みたいになってしまうと、「ああ、日本の内情についてはあまりよくお分かりでないのかな……」と思ってしまう程度には、個人的には針の筵ですから。

そこにこういうブーメランとか、どこから持ってきた現状認識なのかわからないコメントがぶら下がってることがね、心配なわけです。
「義勇兵として台湾に行くつもり」みたいな勇ましいコメントもありましたね。なんとも……。

external.description: 経験知と暗黙知の違いと関係  1. 暗黙知（Tacit Knowledge） 提唱者：マイケル・ポランニー（Michael Polanyi）が1966年の著書『暗黙知の次元』で有名にした概念 定義：「われわれは語ることができること以上に知っている」（We know more than we can tell.） 特徴：   言語化・文章化が非常に難しい知識   身体感覚や直感、五感を通じて身につく   「やってみて初めて分かる」知識 代表例：   自転車の乗り方（バランス感覚）   水泳の「水をかく」感覚   顔認識（特定の人の顔を一瞬で認識できるが、その基準を言葉で説明するのはほぼ不可能）   職人の高度な技術（名工の「勘」）  2. 経験知（Experiential Knowledge） 自分が実際に体験したことを通じて得た知識全般を指す広い概念 暗黙知も含むが、言語化可能な部分も多く含む 特徴：   「百聞は一見に如かず」「失敗は成功の母」の類いの知識   個人の独自のコンテクストに強く結びついている   再現性が低く、他者への伝達が難しい場合が多い 例：   「あのプロジェクトで痛い目に遭ったから、次はこうしよう」という学び（言語化可能）   海外で長年暮らして身についた「空気を読む」感覚（暗黙知に近い）  経験知と暗黙知の関係（図解風）  経験知（広い概念） 　├── 形式知化された経験知（言語化・文章化可能） 　│   　例：「失敗したときにこう対処した」というノウハウ、マニュアル化された経験 　└── 暗黙知としての経験知（言語化が極めて困難） 　　　 例：自転車の乗り方、職人の手さばき、ベテランの「勘」  組織・ビジネスにおける重要性（SECIモデル）  野中郁次郎教授が提唱した有名な知識創造モデル（SECIモデル）では、この2つが中心的な役割を果たします：  共同化（Socialization）：暗黙知 → 暗黙知      → 場を共有し、経験をともにすることで暗黙知が伝播（例：師匠と弟子、OJT）  表出化（Externalization）：暗黙知 → 形式知      → 最も難しいが価値の高いプロセス（例：職人の技術をマニュアル化、暗黙の顧客ニーズを言語化）  連結化（Combination）：形式知 → 形式知      → 既存の形式知を組み合わせて新しい形式知を作る  内面化（Internalization）：形式知 → 暗黙知      → マニュアルを読んだり研修を受けたりして、再び自分の身体感覚に落とし込む  → このサイクルを回すことで、個人の経験知・暗黙知が組織の資産になっていく  一言でまとめると  「すべての暗黙知は経験知であるが、すべての経験知が暗黙知というわけではない」  経験を通じて得られる知識のうち、特に言語化が極めて困難な部分を「暗黙知」と呼び、特に日本企業が強みとしてきた「現場力」「職人技」「勘と経験」の正体は、ほぼこれです。  最近ではAI時代において「AIには代替できない人間の強み」として、暗黙知・経験知が見直されていますね。
external.title: 経験知と暗黙知

record.text: Courtesy of someone else’s #grok search. images.alt: This painting depicts my father sitting in the familiar comfort of his chair, surrounded by the security of home, while my mother walks alone through an open desert. The image reflects the ten long years she cared for him during his dementia, and the quiet confession she once shared — that sometimes she wanted to walk out into the desert and never return. I didn’t fully understand then how hard those years were for her, how much strength it took to stay. In creating this piece, I am confronting the guilt of not being there for her as much as I wish I had been, and allowing myself to finally let that guilt go. It is both a memory and a release — a moment of love, loss, and forgiveness.

value.text: A piece Olivia Nuzzi published yesterday (as part of a Substack Q+A) called "Signs Your Book Rollout Has Gone Awry":

images.alt:
Signs Your Book Rollout Has Gone Awry								
By Olivia Nuzzi
								
Your agent texts you, unprompted and with no elaboration, “I love you.” Monica Lewinsky reaches out to check on your mental health.
								
Frank Rich encourages you to send your book to Fran Lebowitz because “she is not online.”
								
The woman who realigns your chakras in Santa Monica sends word from her Scotland retreat that she is available for an emergency remote chakra realignment session anytime.
								
An architect of the Iraq War says he’s “been through several things like this but “nothing quite as bad as this.”
								
Your other agent calls to tell you she’s lost three clients “over this.”
								
It seems a positive development when Tina Brown describes your “pretentious” book as “Ezra Pound meets Barbie.”
								
Your colorist who maintains the Barbie aspect refuses to charge you because you “seem so scared” when you arrive to see her in Beverly Hills.
								
A paparazzo attempting once again to convince you that your privacy depe somehow on allowing him to violate your privacy adds an ominous kicker this overture: “This never ends.”
								
87 percent of respondents to a survey say they believe you are a CIA operative
								
Wistfully, you recall kinder public outrages in which there were what seem retrospect merely halfhearted threats of rape or calls to hang you for sedition
								
Monica Lewinsky checks in again. The crisis PR experts are in crisis.
													
You consider falsifying email correspondence between yourself and Jeffrey Epstein in order to improve your press coverage.
						
You spend several hours reading about plummeting literacy rates and this soothes you.
						
You spend several more hours thinking about Monica Lewinsky and her irrepressible kindness and grace.
						
You find inventive ways to work the plummeting literacy rates into conversation.
						
When a turtle arrives in your driveway in the afternoon you imbue his visit with meaning.

You forget what day your book is being released.

Sally Quinn tells you to take Ambien.
 
Danielle Frum tells you to take Valium.
 
Mitchell Jackson tells you to check into rehab.
 
Caitlin Flanagan tells you to remember God loves you.
 
Maureen Dowd tells you, “At least you’re still young and beautiful!” A famous self help author tells you to perform an act of witchcraft. You feed the turtle papaya from Erewhon.
						
Many people use the phrase “self care” when addressing you.
						
Multiple people suggest you “pivot to screenwriting.”
						
Various people volunteer various actresses who should play you in a movie.
						
Someone cautions that the demographics of the crowd at the New Beverly to see Goodfellas on 35mm may conflict with your efforts to lay low.
						
You are making efforts to lay low. 

You remember the Paparazzo’s warning, “This never ends,” and decide he perhaps meant it wryly.
								
You are surprised to realize your book is being released today. Monica Lewinsky checks in again.

Signs Your Book Rollout Has Gone Awry

images.alt:
Chifusa's sadistic, older sister. Kagefusa wears a black unitard with thin feather like protrusions on her shoulders and her arms. She has white arm guards, with black gloves and a white cloth wrapped around her waist. She has the same kind of thigh-highs as Chifusa. In later episodes, her outfit is more modest, as there is now a thin piece of black cloth where there previously was an open spot.

Along with her sister, Kagefusa's body is rather over-developed for her age. She has wide birthing hips, thick thighs, prominent glutes, and huge mammaries giving her the silhouette of a fertility goddess. Kagefusa's well-endowed body commands authority and doesn't even seem to cause her movements to slow or give her back pain.

Unlike Chifusa, she is perfectly happy with her family's form of government and goes to great lengths to preserve it. She hates her sister because even though Chifusa has a smaller chest than her, she was still chosen as the Manyū successor over Kagefusa. At the beginning of both the anime and the manga, Chifusa steals Kagefusa's breasts when she unwittingly uses the Breast Flow technique for the first time. After this incident, Kagefusa is forced to wear an inflating bra and she swears a personal vengeance against her sister. She eventually abandons this grudge after Chifusa promsies to return her breasts when she masters the Breast Flow technique. After forgiving Chifusa, Kagefusa's attitude towards life and the Manyu completely changes, turning her into an easygoing and relaxed (albeit still sadistic) person.

Trivia:
Her mother is Juchini. Kagefusa’s older brother is Muneyuki Manyuu.
Prior to her defeat at the hands of Chifusa Manyuu, Kagefusa's breasts were arguably the largest in the series.
True Form Kagefusa's breasts were extraordinarily large and sensitive when compared to other women, and just like her sister Chifusa, she was capable of climaxing from breast contact alone.
As evidenced by Special 3, it seems that Kagefusa's breasts were once capable of producing & storing enormous amounts of milk, & could even lactate upon reaching sexual climax. Kagefusa's engorged mammary glands were shown to not only leak milk, but to shoot full-on fountains of it as well (with no visible signs of running out). Kagefusa comments on the quality of her breast milk by stating, "It contains nutrients that promote breast growth!"
It is most likely Kagefusa lost her ability to produce breast milk following her defeat against Chifusa. However, based on the content of Special 2, it seems as though Chifusa herself may have gained the ability to lactate through her absorption of Kagefusa's tits via the Chichi-Nagare.
Kagefusa is known to be very sexually sadistic and possesses an unmatched sexual appetite. She has molested Oume, Kaede, Ouka, her sister Chifusa, and likely many more unknown women.

(Source: Wikipedia & Manyuu Hikenchou Wiki)

Humans in southern Africa were an isolated population until recently

Collectively, the genetic variants in this population are outside the range of previously described human diversity. That’s despite the fact that the present-day southern African hunter-gatherer populations are largely derived…

external.description: Collectively, the genetic variants in this population are outside the range of previously described human diversity. That’s despite the fact that the present-day southern African hunter-gatherer populations are largely derived from southern African ancestors. What’s distinct? Estimates of the timing of when this ancient south African population branched off from any modern-day populations place the split at over 200,000 years ago, or roughly around the origin of modern humans themselves.

The problem is that we're now building systems that use so much processing, no one has to headaround to figure that stuff out.

And this s*** is heading far quicker towards some nuclear paperclipper than it is a thing with malevolent intent.

record.text: This Pluribus ad on a fridge caused a schizophrenic woman named Carol to be hospitalized.

images.alt: A screenshot of a Reddit post from r/LegalAdviceUK by user Fun-Blueberry-2147. The post describes that the user’s sister, who has schizophrenia, admitted herself to the hospital after believing someone was communicating with her through her smart fridge, which turned out to be an LED screen advertisement. The post explains that she spent two days under monitoring with medication adjustments and that the specific ad she saw included her name, making it especially distressing. The user questions the legality of such targeted or unsettling ads on smart appliances in the UK.

external.description: مثّل سقوط مدينة الفاشر في السادس والعشرين من تشرين الأول/أكتوبر 2025 نقطة تحول حاسمة في الحرب السودانية المستعرة منذ نيسان/أبريل 2023، حيث أكمل الحدث سيطرة قوات الدعم السريع على إقليم دارفور بأكمله، وأعاد رسم خريطة النفوذ في البلاد بشكل يهدد بتقسيمها الفعلي إلى كيانين منفصلين. ويأتي هذا التطور بعد حصار دام ثمانية عشر شهرًا ومعارك ضارية أسفرت عن استيلاء القوات الموالية لمحمد حمدان دقلو “حميدتي” على مقر قيادة الفرقة السادسة مشاة ومطار المدينة، في انتصار رمزي وميداني يمنحها زخمًا عسكريًا ونفسيًا كبيرًا.​ اعتراف البرهان بالانسحاب من الفاشر في كلمة تلفزيونية يوم الاثنين، مبررًا ذلك بـ”الحرص على حياة المواطنين وتجنيب المدينة مزيدًا من الدمار”، يعكس حجم الضغط العسكري الذي واجهته قوات الجيش السوداني، وإن حاول تقديم الانسحاب على أنه قرار تكتيكي مؤقت مع التعهد بـ”استعادة الأراضي والانتقام لشهداء الوطن”.
external.title: السودان على مفترق طرق.. هل نحن أمام تقسيم جديد في المنطقة؟ – قناة المنار

انقلاب حافلة تقل أطفالا لاعبي كرة قدم على طريق سريع في مقاطعة تشيليابينسك الروسية (فيديو)

وذكرت النيابة العامة أنها فتحت تحقيقا في الحادث المروري للحافلة التي تقل الأطفار من مدينة ماغنيتوغورسك إلى تشيليابينسك. وأشارت إلى أن الأطفال يخضعون حاليا لفحوص طبية. وأضافت أن "التحقيق سيقيم مدى التزام شركة…

external.description: وذكرت النيابة العامة أنها فتحت تحقيقا في الحادث المروري للحافلة التي تقل الأطفار من مدينة ماغنيتوغورسك إلى تشيليابينسك. وأشارت إلى أن الأطفال يخضعون حاليا لفحوص طبية. وأضافت أن "التحقيق سيقيم مدى التزام شركة النقل بقوانين السلامة المرورية، وتحديد أسباب وملابسات الحادث، واتخاذ التدابير اللازمة لحماية حقوق الضحايا". وأكدت أنه بناء على نتائج التحقيق سيتم اتخاذ القرارات المناسبة. يلعب وذكرت وسائل إعلام روسية أن الأطفال الذين تتراوح أعمارهم بين 10 و14 عاما، كانوا في طريقهم إلى مباراة. وفقد السائق السيطرة على السيارة بسبب الطرقات الزلقة، مما تسبب بانحراف الحافلة وانقلابها. وكان على متنها 37 شخصا وقت الحادث.

The 45-Day TLS Countdown: Why Let’s Encrypt’s Move Makes Automation Non-Negotiable

Introduction: The landscape of web security is tightening. Let's Encrypt, the cornerstone of free and automated TLS/SSL certificates, has announced a seismic policy shift: reducing certificate validity from 90 days…

external.description: Introduction: The landscape of web security is tightening. Let's Encrypt, the cornerstone of free and automated TLS/SSL certificates, has announced a seismic policy shift: reducing certificate validity from 90 days to just 45 days, with full enforcement by 2028. This strategic move, driven by the CA/Browser Forum's evolving security requirements, fundamentally alters the DevSecOps playbook, making flawless certificate lifecycle automation an absolute imperative to avoid widespread service outages.
external.title: The 45-Day TLS Countdown: Why Let’s Encrypt’s Move Makes Automation Non-Negotiable

Solidarity seems like a noble goal, but it's specious at best. When rallying for a cause, we want solidarity – for others to join – but what if we are among the others? #Solidarity comes at the expense of self – fine if you are already committed. Otherwise, not so much.

record.bridgyOriginalText:
I've refined the maths for my Transductive Subjectivity thesis, if you're into that sort of thing. Whilst the simple model works, the advanced model tells the story in more detail, where the slices of episodic self emerge to future slices by being acted on and transduced by the current self (Si), relative forces (Ri), and the update rule (Fi). More detail on the blog.

anyhow, the tl;dr:
- this was done using claude code
- total time was something like 4-5 hours
- more than half that time was spent forcing claude to test it locally using curl to validate the various ratelimiting and referrer checks and other stuff that should nuke bots, scrapers, pw stuffers etc

- tomorrow i put it under apache and take pics of all the nerd shit i wanna sell

@philipandrewhoover.bsky.social  writes that he often feels that he’s living a double life. How can this sick side of him be so central, so enormous, yet so unseen by those who know and love him? bit.ly/4pf80g7

images.alt: Edvard Munch’s Melancholy depicts a man sitting by himself on the seashore, resting his head on his hand, with a look of deep sadness on his face. The text reads, “The Sick Times. You know someone with Long COVID. They need you to ask about it genuinely. By Philip Hoover.”

“The worst part of getting Long COVID was the cruelty of the disease, a punitive unraveling of my health and identity. The next-worst part, and just as heartbreaking, was discovering how few of my friends and loved ones could engage with my illness in ways that felt caring.”

【要約】日経平均株価731円高　金利高と共存、高市政権の支持率支え

午後の東京株式市場では日経平均株価が一時1000円超上昇し、5万800円前後で推移しました。これはAIへの高い関心から半導体や産業用ロボット関連株が買われたことが主な要因です。高市首相の財政拡張姿勢により国内金利は上昇したものの、高支持率に支えられた安定政権への期待が株式相場を支えました。

【要約】日経平均前引け　続伸　731円高の5万0596円

4日午前の東京株式市場で日経平均株価は続伸し、前引けは前日比731円56銭高の5万0596円24銭でした。米FRBの利下げ期待が主力株への買いを誘い、ロボット関連株を中心に幅広い銘柄が物色されました。これにより、日経平均はじわじわと上げ幅を拡大しました。

record.text:
【要約】為替市場の過度な変動「必要に応じて適切に対応」　木原官房長官

木原官房長官は、為替市場の急激な変動に「憂慮」を表明し、必要に応じた適切な対応を示唆しました。
足元では為替の一方的な動きが見られ、国内長期金利も18年半ぶりの高水準に上昇しています。
官房長官は、金利動向の安定を重視し、経済への影響はマクロ経済などを含め総合的に捉える考えを述べました。

external.description: "Magkano?" (How much?) — it's the most common and often the most dreaded question for any freelance web developer in the Philippines. Pricing your services correctly is a delicate balance. Price too high, and you might scare away potential clients. Price too low, and you undervalue your work, attract difficult clients, and struggle to build a sustainable business. As a web developer in the Philippines who has navigated this challenge for years, I've learned that confident pricing comes from a clear, structured approach. This guide will walk you through practical strategies to estimate scope, set fair rates, and present proposals that Filipino clients will understand and trust.
external.title: Stop Guessing Your Rates: How Filipino Web Devs Can Price Projects Like Pros

external.description:
I like to encapsulate as many business rules and logic as possible in class libraries.

 

These are often used in web APIs, Azure Functions or wherever is required.

 

Sometimes you want to access values from an appsettings.json file that exists in a class library project but not pass values or JSON references through different layers of your solution to said class library.

 

This short post shows you how to do this.

 

Note: This is more for my own reference and when creating prototypes locally, but you may find it useful.

A better approach for cloud solution configuration management is to use Azure Key Vault or Azure App Configuration.
~

Appsettings.json
We have the following values in the JSON file:
{
 YourKey1: YourValue1,
 YourKey2: YourValue2
}
 
Creating a Helper Class
A static helper class ApplicationConfiguration is created.

It imports the namespace Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.

The appsettings.json file is loaded from the directly the assembly is run
external.title: Reading Appsettings.json from Class Library projects in .NET

external.description: Vote for us in NPR’s People’s Choice Awards: npr.org/peopleschoice AI is already reshaping how people find work. Fewer entry-level jobs, robot recruiters, and ever-changing new skill requirements all add up to a new, daunting landscape for humans trying to find dignified work.Today on the show: two stories from the edges of a changing labor market. First we’ll assess claims that AI is causing a white collar job apocalypse. What does the data actually say? We meet an economist who has found one small but fascinating way to measure the impact of AI on workers. Then, we go face-to-face, or at least voice-to-voice, with AI.
